text: Rissa may refer to: ==Animals== *Rissa (bird), genus of birds known as kittiwakes *Rissa brevirostris, also known as the red-legged kittiwake *Rissa tridactyla, also known as the black-legged kittiwake ==People== *Rissa (artist) (born 1938), German artist and wife of Karl Otto Götz ==Places== *Rissa, Norway, a former municipality in the old Sør-Trøndelag county, Norway *Rissa, also known as Årnset, a village in Indre Fosen municipality in Trøndelag county, Norway *Rissa Church, a church in Leira in Indre Fosen municipality in Trøndelag county, Norway ==Other== *, a Finnish merchant ship in service 1955-61 *Rissa IL, a Norwegian sports club from Rissa, Norway
title: Rissa
